Paragraph.Text: The culmination of our work on this planet. The Orbital Energy Transmitter (OET) will be able send enough energy into the Low-Orbit Ion Cannon (LOIC). This accumulated energy can then be redirected down onto the surface in a non-nuclear but massively destructive way, capable of vapourising anything for a huge distance around it. We must protect our base while we power the OET, for if our Central Power Hub is badly damaged the OET will quickly discharge.
The Orbital Energy Transmitter is a massive construction requiring 1053 components in total. It must be built 13m tall on a 9m by 9m base with a clear view of the sky.
